Variables
SharpNeat.​Neat.​Reproduction.​Asexual.​Strategy
namespace SharpNeat.Neat.Reproduction.Asexual.Strategy
AddCyclicConnectionStrategy
IAsexualReproductionStrategy​<T>
public sealed
AddCyclicConnectionStrategy​<T>
where T : struct

A NEAT genome asexual reproduction strategy based on adding a single connection.

Offspring genomes are created by taking a clone of a single parent genome and adding a single connection, if possible.

Type Parameter
T

Connection weight data type.
